text: Those who stayed behind will say, when you ˹believers˺ set out to take the spoils of war, “Let us accompany you.” They wish to change God’s promise. Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “You will not accompany us. This is what God has said before.” They will then say, “In fact, you are driven by jealousy against us!” The truth is: they can hardly comprehend
